[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1516226143430{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/single-resource-page-bg-colorol-1902×496.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Boost Lead Generation 5x With Marketing Automation

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508356835465{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

On Demand Webinar
Air Date: Thursday, June 29, 2017
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1507570167359{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156850″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1508356566038{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156851″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1508356585808{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron” css=”.vc_custom_1513212254667{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Learn how one agency used marketing automation to double a client’s revenue in six months – without increasing marketing spend.

With marketing automation, not only can you increase lead generation, but you can also boost ROI and deliver real, measurable results for clients. PlanStartGrow, a SharpSpring partner agency, did just that.  

Omar Barraza of PlanStartGrow shared his insights on using marketing automation to bring in 5x more leads at an 80% reduced cost per lead. He covered how to:

  • Pitch the importance of marketing automation to clients
  • Personalize each campaign with expert content marketing
  • Prove ROI and reallocate budget to winning campaigns

[/vc_column_text]

Your Hosts:

Omar Barraza

Marketing Strategist, PlanStartGrow

Omar Barraza is a certified SharpSpring Silver Partner recently recognized by LinkedIn with a trio of ProFinder “Best of 2016” awards for marketing consulting, digital marketing, and lead generation. PlanStartGrow focuses on updating marketing strategy and implementing automated marketing solutions that grow revenue without increasing budgets.

Koertni Adams

Partner Enablement Manager, SharpSpring

Koertni came to SharpSpring from a partner agency. She has walked in your shoes pitching and using marketing automation. She now develops content, programs, events and other resources to help agency partners become even more proficient at growing revenues and serving clients.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1507570006488{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch it now

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy


[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
